Have you ever been in a situation with your friends when you can't decide what to do? With this app, your everyday decisions will flow like a charm and you never have to argue again.
 
 Using the app is as simple as this:
 1. Create a new list
 2. Add all the activities you consider doing on that list (you can ignore bonus and peril points for now)
 3. Every voter lists their top 7 activities
 4. Activities that receive the most amount of points will move on to the next voting round
 5. Every voter lists their top 5 activities from the remaining list
 6. Select all the activities which your group of friends will do today
 7. Save and enjoy!
 
 If you are already used to the concept of voting and want to use the app regularly, there are some extra steps which can improve your voting experience:
 
 - Every activity that makes it into the top 7 list will gain 1 "bonus" point
 - Every other activity will gain 1 "peril" point
 - When activity gains over 5 peril points, it will be removed from the list (you can return it back by clicking the fallen button)
 - You can alter all of these point thresholds and other settings from the setting menu
 
 Note: You can read this tutorial at any time from the Google Play Store
